game.name: Fate Architect
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fate Architect is a roguelike deckbuilder where you build and modify symbols on a slot machine to earn points and shape your strategy. Each run offers new combinations, synergies, and challenges as you design the ultimate slot machine of fate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fate Architect is a roguelike deckbuilder where you build and modify symbols on a slot machine to earn points and shape your strategy. Each run offers new combinations, synergies, and challenges as you design the ultimate slot machine of fate.
